verbose_text: Importantly, Gsdmd -/- cells given CTB+ LPS fail to activate caspase-1 and thus retain UBE2L3 protein even though they lose UBE2L3 upon canonical activation of NLRP3, AIM2, or NLRC4 inflammasomes (XREF_FIG F, XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C, and S2H).
evidence: Gsdmd -/-  cells given CTB+LPS fail to activate caspase-1
